sense.def:
To praise someone or something
pomeni izraziti svoje odobravanje nekoga ali nečesa zaradi njegovih dosežkov ali lastnosti.

seg.quote: Sylvia had a stern father who never praised her.
They praised his speech for its clarity and humour.

sense.def:
Praise
je tisto, kar rečemo ali napišemo o nekom, ko ga pohvalimo.

seg.quote: Three entrants were singled out for special praise.
She finds it hard to give praise.

sense.def:
To sing someone's praises
pomeni nekoga zelo navdušeno hvaliti.
